Text: PL effect of Energy Trends Fixing Cc The Department of Trade and Industry in the UK comes out every quarter with their Energy Trends Fuel oil assessment for a quarter in arrears They published this week their Q figure and revised up their Q figure the net effect is a hit to the book I would expect that they revise down these figures in their next publication due mid Jan We are adjusting the Energy Trends curve for the actual fixings tonight since it effects a lot of other books in Enron Europe and will therefore take a hit of k tomorrow
